ComicInfo.Summary:
Pryor has gotten a taste of what it’s like to be special. To be on top. And he likes it. But after trading one spirit for another, the process of possession is beginning to take its toll on his body.
Meanwhile, Ronan has stepped up as Pryor’s manager and exorcist. The life that she has al-ways wanted to live is in sight. Unfortunately, she can tell something is wrong with her broth-er. And when Pryor finally gets an opportunity for his first break at the big time, he and his sis-ter must decide if another possession is worth it to take the shot.
